abstract: Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Hyun-Jin Ryu takes two weeks off for shoulder pain; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles will rest pitcher Hyun-Jin Ryu for two weeks to see if it eases the discomfort in his left shoulder. Ryu will most likely begin the season on the disabled list.
snippet: Los Angeles will rest pitcher Hyun-Jin Ryu for two weeks to see if it eases the discomfort in his left shoulder. Ryu will most likely begin the season on the disabled list.
